meanings.definition: The end of a cable or wire where signals are transmitted or received.
meanings.sent1: The headend of the cable is where the internet signal comes in.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the connections at the headend of the wire.
meanings.sent3: The headend of the wire was feeling overwhelmed with all the signals passing through.
meanings.sent4: She imagined the headend of the cable as a bustling train station, with signals coming and going.
meanings.sent5: The headend of the wire was like a busy intersection, with signals crossing in all directions.

meanings.definition: The point where a process or system begins or originates.
meanings.sent1: The headend of the project is where we need to focus our attention.
meanings.sent2: Let's start at the headend of the system and work our way through.
meanings.sent3: The headend of the process seemed to be the most exciting part.
meanings.sent4: At the headend of the system, everything seemed full of potential and possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The headend of the project was like the first page of a book, setting the tone for what was to come.
